Text.Name: Trash
Text.IVNUMBER.0.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This pork increases Specter Refinement by 10. Pork that makes you want to fly.
Text.IVNUMBER.1.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This mushroom increases Specter Refinement by 10. Eating it does not only feel like ascension, but you actually ascend (to kingdom come).
Text.IVNUMBER.2.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This handkerchief is made from beast hide. Nobody can see what's hidden within.
Text.IVNUMBER.3.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This bracelet is made of Holy Stone, very hard and durable.
Text.IVNUMBER.4.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This blade is made of Ice Essence, so cold and bright that blinds the enemy's eyes.
Text.IVNUMBER.5.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This axe is made of Fire Essence, each cut scorching the enemy to ash.
Text.IVNUMBER.6.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This pickaxe is made of lumina core, the essence of the universe, radiating the force of all stars.
Text.IVNUMBER.7.ItemExtraInfo.Desc: This farming tool is made of darksteel. It is very, very, very expensive!
